translation: Hello, everyone!
transcript: 大家好！

translation: I'm a R&D engineer for Baidu UNIT platform.
transcript: 我是百度UNIT平台的研发工程师。

translation: Welcome to our advanced course for dialogue system.
transcript: 欢迎各位关注我们的对话系统高级课程。

translation: Today, I will talk about how to integrate a dialogue system into the UNIT platform.
transcript: 接下来，我将为大家介绍一下一个对话系统应该如何对接UNIT平台。

translation: This course involves five sections.
transcript: 今天的课程主要包括五个小节。

translation: In the first section, I will review the elementary course for system integration.
transcript: 第一小节回顾一下系统对接的初级课程。

translation: In the second and third sections, I will analyze the initiator and responder in a dialogue from the perspective of engineering architecture.
transcript: 第二、三小节我将从工程架构的视角分析一下谁在响应对话，谁在发起对话。

translation: In the fourth section, I will talk about how developers manage multiple tenants after building a dialogue management system on the UNIT platform.
transcript: 第四小节我会介绍一下，当开发者基于UNIT平台搭建了一套自己的对话管理系统之后，应该如何实现多租户的管理。

translation: Finally, I will talk about more solutions for system integration.
transcript: 最后我会对我们在系统对接方面的更多规划做介绍。

translation: In the elementary course, we presented a simple script.
transcript: 在初级课程中，我们介绍了一个简单的脚本。

translation: This script passed the authentication of Baidu's AI open platform, integrated with the dialogue interface on the UNIT platform, and  a multi-turn dialogue.
transcript: 这个脚本通过了百度AI开放平台的鉴权流程，对接了UNIT平台的对话接口，完成了一次多轮对话的交互。

translation: The dialogue process is shown in the following figure.
transcript: 对话过程如下图所示。

translation: Through the two turns of dialogue, the bot can recognize that the user's intent is to switch the channel to CCTV1.
transcript: 通过这两轮的对话，机器人可以识别出用户的意图是把频道切换到中央一台。

translation: You can find a complete introduction to this example in the elementary course.
transcript: 这个示例的完整介绍，大家可以在初级课程中找到。

translation: Now, let's analyze the process.
transcript: 接下来我们一起分析一下。

translation: Who is the responder in the dialogue?
transcript: 是谁在响应对话？

translation: When we recorded the elementary course, a BOT responded to the request for a dialogue.
transcript: 在录制初级课程时，响应用户对话请求的主体是单个bot。

translation: In the recent upgrade, we replaced the term "BOT" with "skill", and would always use "skill" in the future.
transcript: 在最近的升级中，我们使用“技能”这个概念代替了bot，并且以后会统一使用“技能”这个概念。

translation: For transition, you can think "skills" as "BOT" used before.
transcript: 在过渡阶段，大家可以认为现在的“技能”就是之前的bot。

translation: In addition to Skill, we will release bot service response dialogues.
transcript: 而除了技能，我们还将新增机器人层级的服务响应对话。

translation: On the UNIT platform, skills are the smallest unit of each effective training.
transcript: 在UNIT平台中，一个技能是一次训练生效的最小单元。

translation: A bot is usually a set of skills, and can be configured with multiple skills and more dialogue policies.
transcript: 而一个机器人，通常是一组技能的集合，可以配置多个技能和更多的对话策略。

translation: Skills will be available respectively in stores,  developers' and bots' skill lists.
transcript: 技能，将会出现在三个地方，分别是商店中、开发者的技能列表中和机器人的技能列表中。

translation: In stores, we can enjoy skills only on web pages, but cannot invoke them by APIs.
transcript: 商店中的技能只能通过网站的页面进行体验，不能通过API进行调用。

translation: Developers can "purchase" skills from stores.
transcript: 开发者可以通过“购买”。

translation: Please pay attention to the quotation marks.
transcript: 注意是加引号的购买。

translation: Then developers can add them to their skill lists.
transcript: 将商店中的技能放到自己的技能列表中。

translation: Developers can create bots to register and generate a bot service at the appropriate architecture.
transcript: 开发者可以创建机器人，对应的架构层面会注册生成一个机器人服务。

translation: They can configure the bot service with the skills in the skill list, and invoke the service through API.
transcript: 开发者可以将技能列表中的若干技能配置到机器人服务中，进而通过API调用机器人服务。

translation: They can also invoke the skills directly through API.
transcript: 当然也可以通过API直接调用技能。

translation: Generally, products are researched and developed after full technical investigation before they are released to online users.
transcript: 产品研发一般要经过充分的技术调研，然后再服务线上用户。

translation: So we set up two environments to ensure that developers launch improved bots and skills for dialogues.
transcript: 对此我们使用两套环境来保证开发者的对话机器人与对话技能进行效果打磨和发布上线。

translation: The sandbox environment is used for model training and performance test.
transcript: 沙盒环境是用于模型训练与效果测试的环境。

translation: It is usually deployed for single instance.
transcript: 通常是单实例部署的。

translation: The model trained in the sandbox environment can be released to the production environment.
transcript: 沙盒环境训练好的模型可以发布到生产环境。

translation: When being released, bot services occupy fewer resources, and will be deployed directly in three areas.
transcript: 在发布时，机器人服务占用的资源较少，所以在部署上会直接覆盖三个地域。

translation: Skills occupy more resources, and the machine costs are mainly from skills deployment.
transcript: 而技能占用的资源较多，机器成本也主要由技能的部署组成。

translation: So developers can configure the areas for deployment by themselves.
transcript: 所以技能的部署地域由开发者自己选择。

translation: Moreover, the bots in the production environment can invoke the skills only for the production environment.
transcript: 另外，生产环境的机器人只能调用生产环境中的技能。

translation: On the UNIT platform, a mechanism is established for developers to manage their dialogue performance.
transcript: UNIT平台建立了一套对开发者的对话效果进行管理的机制。

translation: For a skill, the ID is unique for the dialogue performance at any time, and can be used to reproduce the dialogue performance.
transcript: 对于单个技能，在任意时刻的对话效果都有唯一的ID进行标识，并且可以根据这个ID对相应的对话效果进行复现。

translation: For each training, the model will be updated, and a new model ID will be created for each update.
transcript: 每次训练都会更新模型，每次模型更新都会产生一个新的模型ID。

translation: As shown in the figure on the right, a model ID includes the user-defined data version, dialogue operator version, and basic data version.
transcript: 如右图所示，模型ID包含了用户自定义的数据的版本，对话算子的版本和基础数据的版本。

translation: Similarly, there will be a version for bots. Robot versions include related skill versions and bot configurations.
transcript: 相应的，机器人也会有版本管理机器人的版本不但包含与其相关的技能的版本，还包括机器人级别的一些配置。

translation: In general, the user's objective for dialogues is a model or a set of models.
transcript: 总的来说，用户的对话目标是一个模型或一组模型。

translation: And the dialogue performances are mapped to a new ID or a set of new IDs every time they change.
transcript: 而这些模型的对话效果每次发生变化时都会映射到一个或一组新的ID。

translation: That's all for the responder in a dialogue.
transcript: 好的，对对话响应者的介绍就到这里。

translation: Next, let's analyze the initiator in a dialogue from the perspective of engineering architecture.
transcript: 接下来继续从工程架构的视角分析一下是谁在发起对话。

translation: On the Baidu's AI open platform, authentication is based on OAuth 2.0.
transcript: 百度AI开放平台实现了基于OAuth 2.0的认证方式。

translation: A group of AK/SK matches a developer account, which may be allocated with multiple groups of AK/SK.
transcript: 一组AK/SK对应了一个开发者账号，一个开发者账号可以有多组AK/SK。

translation: We can store AK/SK directly on the client devices.
transcript: 我们可以将AK/SK直接内置到C端设备中。

translation: However, this causes severe security risks, and applies only to demo presentation.
transcript: 这显然存在极大的安全隐患，这种方式仅适用于DEMO演示。

translation: If UNIT dialogue services must be accessed directly on a mobile device, the integrateion architecture in the second solution is recommended.
transcript: 如果出于某些原因，一定要在移动端直接访问UNIT对话服务，那么建议采用方案2的对接架构。

translation: The developer's server and mobile device will establish a "login" relationship, which can be a self-built login mechanism or from a third party.
transcript: 移动设备开发者服务端建立“登录”关系，可以是第三方登录，也可以是开发者自建的登录机制。

translation: The developer's server stores AK/SK, and communicates with Baidu's AI open platform to obtain access_token.
transcript: 开发者服务端保存AK/SK，并负责与百度AI开放平台进行通信，获取access_token。

translation: An access_token can be applied from a mobile device to the developer's server, or pushed from the developer's server to a mobile device.
transcript: access_token可以由移动设备向开发者服务端进行申请。

translation: It is recommended to manage the access_token in the period of validity.
transcript: 也可以由开发者服务端向移动设备进行推送,建议对access_token的有效期进行有效的管理。

translation: After the UNIT platform understands the intent, slot, action and so on, developers must develop certain logic to interact for the final dialogue.
transcript: 在UNIT平台理解了意图、词槽、动作等之后，往往需要开发者开发一定的逻辑，完成最终的对话交互。

translation: This logic may require access to other services.
transcript: 这部分逻辑可能需要访问其它的服务。

translation: On the UNIT platform, we call this process as an introduction of dialogue resources, such as querying weather, and work order status, etc.
transcript: 在UNIT平台中，我们把这个过程称为对话资源引入，比如查询天气、工单状态等信息。

translation: On the UNIT platform, the built-in dialogue resources will reuse the integration process of open APIs.
transcript: UNIT内置的对话资源，将复用UNIT开放API的对接流程。

translation: Generally, authentication mechanisms are required by third-party dialogue resources.
transcript: 第三方对话资源，一般的都会存在一定的鉴权机制。

translation: Now, let's take OAuth 2.0 as an example.
transcript: 我们以OAuth 2.0为例。

translation: Developers need to release access_token to appropriate devices.
transcript: 那么开发者需要将access_token发布给对应的设备。

translation: According to the previous section, we can consider the UNIT public cloud as a kind of "mobile device".
transcript: 参考上一章节，我们可以把UNIT公有云也作为一种“移动设备”来看待。

translation: Section 4, how does our platform support developers to achieve multi-tenancy?
transcript: 第四小节，如何支持开发者实现多租户？

translation: Some of you may be unfamiliar with "multi-tenant", a design concept that should be widely used in our system.
transcript: 有些同学可能会对多租户这个概念比较陌生，但这个设计思路应该广泛地存在我们的系统中。

translation: For details of the concept, please see the description on the right.
transcript: 具体的概念可以参考右侧的描述。

translation: I will not present it in detail.
transcript: 这里不做展开介绍。

translation: On the UNIT platform, how can a developer achieve a multi-tenant system?
transcript: 那么基于UNIT平台，开发者应该如何实现自己的多租户系统？

translation: First, build a multi-account management system.
transcript: 第一，自建多账号管理。

translation: Second, fully use tags for data isolation.
transcript: 第二，充分利用标签功能，实现数据隔离。

translation: Firstly, developers can build their account mapping.
transcript: 首先，开发者可以自建账号映射。

translation: For our UNIT platform, a developer system corresponds to one developer account.Multi-account management is for the business relationship between the developer system and the developer-customer system.
transcript: 多账号的管理是开发者系统和开发者客户系统之间的业务关系。

translation: For the UNIT platform, a developer system corresponds only to one developer account.
transcript: 对于UNIT平台来说，一个开发者系统只对应了一个开发者账号。

translation: Secondly, we can fully use tags.
transcript: 其次，可以充分利用标签的功能。

translation: The dialogue intent and Q&A intent of the UNIT platform support tag attributes.
transcript: UNIT平台的对话意图和问答意图都支持标签属性。

translation: The logic of intent label and dialogue are as follows.
transcript: 意图的标签与对话逻辑如下。

translation: An intent can have multiple attributes, and a conversation request can have multiple tag parameters.
transcript: 一个意图可以有多个属性标签，一次对话请求可以包含多个标签参数。

translation: Tag parameters and attributes match through the "OR" logic — business logic that needs "AND" can also be converted into "OR" to be successfully implemented.
transcript: 标签参数和属性通过“或”的关系匹配，需要进行“与”的业务逻辑可以转换成“或”实现。

translation: As shown in the figure on the right, based on a UNIT bot service, multiple "small bots" can be built.
transcript: 基于一个UNIT机器人服务，可以建立多个“小机器人”，示意图如右侧所示。

translation: Next, we will come to the last section of this chapter to introduce more solutions for integration.
transcript: 接下来是本章的最后一个小节，将介绍更多的对接方案。

translation: After ordinary developers log into our UNIT platform, they will see our main architecture.
transcript: 一般的开发者登录到UNIT平台之后，看到的就是我们的主线架构。

translation: For developers closely working with us or in need of high customization, we will provide the private domain cloud architecture.
transcript: 对于一些深度合作或者定制化程度比较高的开发者，我们会提供云端私有域架构。

translation: Its function is based on a version of our major frame, which may have been customized.
transcript: 功能方面是基于主线架构的某个版本，这个版本可能做了定制化开发。

translation: For deployment, there is also an independent solution.
transcript: 部署方面也是相对独立的部署方案。

translation: The computing resources and stability of the system will not be affected by other developers.
transcript: 系统的稳定性和计算资源不会受到其他开发者的影响。

translation: For the offline embedded architecture, the UNIT dialogue capability is deployed on the embedded devices as a solution.
transcript: 另外是离线嵌入式架构，是将UNIT对话能力部署到嵌入式设备中的方案。

translation: Because of the limited computing resources of the terminal equipment, in order to ensure the performance and responsiveness requirements at the product level, the performance will be reduced to a certain extent.
transcript: 因为终端设备的计算能力有限，所以为了保证产品层面的性能响应要求，效果方面会有一定程度的下降。

translation: In the future, there will also be solutions for online/offline integration.
transcript: 将来这个方向还会衍生出离、在线融合的方案。

translation: And integrated private cloud architecture in this area, which package all of our UNIT capabilities into one or a set of mirrors.
transcript: 还有私有云一体化架构，把我们的UNIT的所有能力都打包放进一个或一组镜像里。

translation: For docker images or virtual machine images with the authorization that we need to deliver, we will provide mirror-level SLAs.
transcript: 我们交付的是需要授权的docker镜像或者虚拟机镜像，我们会提供镜像级别的SLA。

translation: In this area, clustered deployment solutions of private cloud will be derived in the future.
transcript: 在这个方向上，将来还会衍生出私有云集群化部署方案。

translation: The cluster solution reduces machine costs mainly through optimizing deployment - our UNIT platforms will provide more advice on cluster solution at that time.
transcript: 集群化方案主要是通过部署优化来降低机器成本，在那个时候UNIT平台会提供关于集群部署的更多建议。

translation: For our new UNIT products, we will create a separate process, turn the leading dialogue technology into products.
transcript: 关于UNIT的新产品，我们会建立一套相对独立的产品发布流程，将前沿的对话技术产品化。

translation: And discuss with developers about the trend of dialogue technologies.
transcript: 和各位开发者一起探讨对话技术的发展方向。

translation: That's all for today.
transcript: 好的，今天的课程就到这里。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
